Morgan St, MC 152, Chicago, IL, 60607    Office Phone:  (312) 996-3236    Email:  mhalle5@uic.edu    Related Sites:    UIC Innovation Center          About   As a Lecturer in the UIC Computer Science Department, I teach in the general area of software engineering. Previous courses taught include:   CS 111. Program Design 1  CS 141. Program Design 2  CS 342. Software Design  CS 341. Programming Language Design and Implementation  CS 478. Software Development for Mobile Platforms   Research:  In addition to teaching I am the Director of the Caterpillar Research Lab and Co-Director of the OSF HealthCare Lab. These are both corporate sponsored, interdisciplinary research labs located at the UIC Innovation Center.  The Caterpillar Research Lab is focused on identifying innovative business opportunities, solving safety issues, creating new service models and improving machine and user performance to enhance overall efficiency. Caterpillar Inc. is a Fortune 100 corporation and the worlds largest construction equipment manufacturer. Some of the lab’s research has involved leveraging machine learning algorithms to interpret sensor data in real time and creating sensor networks, incorporating wearable technology, to improve overall safety and efficiency for large scale operations.  The OSF HealthCare Lab uses human-centered design and design-thinking methodologies of user research, collaboration, and prototyping & testing to understand, identify and design solutions that fit the needs of under served populations. OSF, based in Peoria IL with over 150 primary care and specialist offices and services, is at the forefront of innovation and technology providing downstate Illinois and the Upper Peninsula of Michigan.  Research in the lab focuses on new service offerings, products, apps, business models, process performance improvements, data visualizations and knowledge frameworks.  Research Interests:  Software Engineering, Systems, Mobile Security and Privacy, Computer Science Education       Education   MS, Computer Science, University of Illinois at Chicago
